column2: Protocol A is used with adults who are Every-Day Smokers.  On the average, about how many cigarettes do you now smoke each day?
column9: Note to interviewer:  Every-Day Smokers (that is, Tobacco - Smoking Status adult protocol, if Question 1 is "Yes" and Question 3 is "Every day") are asked.  One pack usually equals 20 cigarettes. If converting packs to cigarettes, always verify calculation with respondent.

column2: Protocol A is used with adults who are Every-Day Smokers.  On the average, about how many cigarettes do you now smoke each day?
Protocol B is used with adults who are Some-Day Smokers.  On how many of the past 30 days did you smoke cigarettes?
column9: Note to interviewer: Some-Say Smokers (that is, Tobacco - Smoking Status adult protocol, if Question 1 is "Yes" and Question 3 is "Some days") are asked.

column2: Protocol B is used with adults who are Some-Day Smokers.  On how many of the past 30 days did you smoke cigarettes?
Protocol B is used with adults who are Some-Day Smokers.  On the average, on those [NUMFILL] days, how many cigarettes did you usually smoke each day?
column9: NUMFILL is the number of days provided in Question 1.  Note to interviewer: Some-Say Smokers (that is, Tobacco - Smoking Status adult protocol, if Question 1 is "Yes" and Question 3 is "Some days") are asked.

column2: Protocol B is used with adults who are Some-Day Smokers.  On the average, on those [NUMFILL] days, how many cigarettes did you usually smoke each day?
Protocol C is used with adults who are Former Smokers.  Have you EVER smoked cigarettes EVERY DAY for at least 6 months?
column9: Note to interviewer: Former Smokers (that is, Tobacco - Smoking Status adult protocol, If Question 1 is "Yes", Question 3 is "Not at all") are asked.

column2: Protocol C is used with adults who are Former Smokers.  When you last smoked every day, on average how many cigarettes did you smoke each day?
column9: Note to interviewer: Former Smokers (that is, Tobacco - Smoking Status adult protocol, If Question 1 is "Yes", Question 3 is "Not at all") are asked.

column2: Protocol C is used with adults who are Former Smokers.  When you last smoked every day, on average how many cigarettes did you smoke each day?
Protocol C is used with adults who are Former Smokers.  When you last smoked every day, on average how many cigarettes did you smoke each day?
column9: Note to interviewer: Former Smokers (that is, Tobacco - Smoking Status adult protocol, If Question 1 is "Yes", Question 3 is "Not at all") are asked.

column2: Protocol C is used with adults who are Former Smokers.  When you last smoked every day, on average how many cigarettes did you smoke each day?
